content: materials - 2 skeins of purl soho s nigh dk 1 100% cashmere yarn each skein of this light worsted/ dk-weight yarn is 199 yards/ 55 grams approximately 250 total yards required we used the colors ocean storm raindrop blue and warm cognac - us 5 3 75 mm 24-inch circular knitting needles 2 note you can use longer needles if you like but they may feel a little finicky toward the end when you re working on fewer stitches gauge 22 stitches and 43 row = 4 inches in double seed stitch see notes size - finished length of wingspan 41¼ inches wide - finished depth from point to middle of cast-on edge 10¼ inches pattern designed and written by purl soho founder and co-owner joelle hoverson 3 1 https //www purlsoho com/nigh-dk html 2 https //www purlsoho com/tools-and-notions/collection_filter--circular_needles html 3 https //www purlsoho com/create/tag/joelle-hoverson-for-purl-soho/
